Metadata: This DVD contains video essays including "Shifting Baselines in the: Tijuana Tide (5 min.); Surf (5 min.); Puget Sound (5 min.); and a 5 minute Pristine slideshow. Content events include: Roundtable (5 min.); Hollywood Ocean Night (5 min.); Rotten jellyfish awards (3 min.); comedy and SB Flix contest winners. P.S.A.'s include: ocean symphony (1 min.); tiny fish (1 min.); mercury poisoning (1 min.); overfishing of Pollock (1 min.); and C.O.O.L. room (1 min.). Short films on this DVD are as follows: Groundlings comedy films; Birds of a feather (3 min.); Empty oceans (1 min.); Rediagnosing the oceans (7 min.); Mark Dowie: Empowering the grass roots (7 min.); and Jellyfish and bacteria (1 min.).
